summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1994 MERCURY GRAND MARQUIS.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE ON SEPTEMBER 5, 2007 FOR THE VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL.  THE DEACTIVATION SWITCH WAS DISCONNECTED.  HE IS REQUESTING THAT NHTSA MANDATE THE DEALERS TO RECONNECT THE SWITCH SINCE HE WAS DENIED THE RECONNECTION BY THE DEALER.  THE DEALER IS ALSO UNABLE TO INFORM HIM WHEN THE PARTS WILL BE AVAILABLE.  THERE HAD BEEN NO FAILURE TO DATE.  THE RECALL NUMBER WAS UNAVAILABLE.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 118,000.  UPDATED 02-14-08 BF *   THE CONSUMER STATED THE RECALL NUMBER IS 05S28 AND THE DEALER STATED THE PARTS WOULD BE AVAILABLE IN THE 4TH QUARTER OF 2007.  UPDATED 02/14/08  *TR
